about_the_game:
You're the AI

Alice created you after years of work, for a sole purpose: Making her rich. However, due to an unexplained malfunction, your wires got crossed, and your sole objective is now to kill Alice!

Discover the right solution

The game will challenge you to think out of the box as your only way to execute your task is through a highly regulated terminal. Craft commands word by word, and don't forget to experiment in order to find all possible ways to kill Alice. With a curious mind, you will stumble upon and unlock various clever secrets.

Find loopholes

Alice won't let you run amok for long. She keeps inventing new laws to regulate the commands you're allowed to execute, and you'll have to outsmart her over and over to reach your ultimate goal: Escape the simulation she trapped you in.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and suicide.

name: AI Kill Alice - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You are an AI wired with an intense desire to kill your master. Carefully craft commands word by word, and find increasingly complex and clever loopholes to bypass the constraints imposed upon you. Discover amusing secret achievements, or scheme to find the ultimate escape from the simulation.
